name: vuetorrent
description: VueTorrent is a modern web UI for qBittorrent designed to replace the default interface. It provides a responsive, Vue-based frontend for managing torrents in self-hosted setups.
features: Modern interface: Replace qBittorrent's default UI with a sleek, modern Vue-based interface.
Torrent management: Add, pause, resume, and remove torrents with intuitive controls.
Responsive design: Access and manage torrents from desktop, tablet, or mobile devices.
Dark mode: Switch between light and dark themes for comfortable viewing.
Search integration: Search for torrents directly from the interface with built-in search.
Category management: Organize torrents with categories and tags for better organization.
Speed controls: Adjust upload and download speed limits globally or per torrent.
File selection: Choose which files to download from multi-file torrents.
Statistics: View detailed statistics on download speeds, ratios, and torrent health.
Sorting and filtering: Sort and filter torrents by status, category, or custom criteria.
Keyboard shortcuts: Navigate and control torrents efficiently using keyboard shortcuts.
qBittorrent compatible: Works seamlessly with existing qBittorrent installations as a drop-in replacement.
